mergeResults.content: PHYSICAL: Gift-shock—magical channels forcibly burned open, causing white-hot agony, blurred vision, difficulty focusing. Slowly stabilizing via bond with Senta but still fragile. STATUS: Chosen by Companion Senta—now Herald-trainee. COMMITMENT: Sworn to deliver evidence of red-robed attackers to Haven 'without rest.'

STATUS: Herald-trainee (public cover). Possesses complete memory-merge with Herald Talia—all state secrets, diplomatic knowledge, Empathy training techniques. Can mind-speak with forceful untrained broadcast, broke through Talia's shields. Assigned quarters at Healer's cottage in Companion's Field (isolated for safety). COMMITMENT: Sworn to deliver evidence of red-robed attackers to Haven. Information control—Mage-Gift sealed to Circle only. Contingency with Senta to knock him out if losing control.
